Anti-racism protest signs, murals destined for US Smithsonian tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-742618 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/742618/anti-racism-protest-signs-murals-destined-for-us-smithsonian/story/ Placed on the recently renamed Black Lives Matter Plaza, the tributes have created a spontaneous memorial that are now being collected for a more permanent home at the Smithsonian Institution. Mon, 15 Jun 2020 01:42:26 +0800
